SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILDPROJECT_DETERMINEQUOTAELIGIBILITY
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Interrogate project to determine if it may participate in the quota fulfillment process.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILDPROJECT_DETERMINEQUOTAELIGIBILITY (
@childProjectID uniqueidentifier, -- Child Project ID (same as the Constituent ID) of the child project to check eligibility @waitingListReasonID uniqueidentifier = null output) -- Output parm -- if child project is eligible - Null -- if child project is ineligible - The Sponsorship Reason ID to use to put a child on the waiting list
as begin
begin try
-- Child Project Code values
declare @projectStatusActiveID uniqueidentifier = null select @projectStatusActiveID = ID from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = 'active' if @projectStatusActiveID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Active" child project status code'
declare @projectStatusActiveReservedID uniqueidentifier = null select @projectStatusActiveReservedID = ID from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = 'active - reserved' if @projectStatusActiveReservedID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Active - Reserved" child project status code'
declare @performancePoorID uniqueidentifier = null select @performancePoorID = ID from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTPERFORMANCECODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = 'poor' if @performancePoorID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Poor" child project performance code'
-- Waiting List reasons - finding these individually instead of all the start with 'Waiting List' in order to minimize accidental data entry issues
declare @waitingListMarketDemandID uniqueidentifier = null select @waitingListMarketDemandID = ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - market demand' if @waitingListMarketDemandID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Waiting List - market demand" sponsorship reason'
declare @waitingListNotAcceptingID uniqueidentifier = null select @waitingListNotAcceptingID = ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - not accepting new children' if @waitingListNotAcceptingID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Waiting List - not accepting new children" sponsorship reason'
declare @waitingListProjectPerformanceID uniqueidentifier = null select @waitingListProjectPerformanceID = ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - project performance' if @waitingListProjectPerformanceID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Waiting List - project performance" sponsorship reason'
declare @waitingListProjectStatusID uniqueidentifier = null select @waitingListProjectStatusID = ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - project status' if @waitingListProjectStatusID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Waiting List - project status" sponsorship reason'
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
select @waitingListReasonID = case when OVERRIDETRIGGERSTATUSCODE = 1 then -- If code value for 'Yes', then do not perform any checks NULL when (CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID <> @projectStatusActiveID) and (CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID <> @projectStatusActiveReservedID) then @waitingListProjectStatusID when NEWCHILDRENSTATUSCODE = 0 then -- if code value for 'No' @waitingListNotAcceptingID when PERFORMANCECODEID = @performancePoorID then @waitingListProjectPerformanceID when MARKETINGDEMANDSTATUSCODE = 0 then -- if code value for 'No' @waitingListMarketDemandID else NULL end
from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION where ID = @childProjectID
end
